Address.value: 6005 HIDDEN VALLEY ROAD,SUITE 110, CARLSBAD, California, 92011, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Design Therapeutics Inc is a preclinical-stage biopharmaceutical company. It is a pioneering novel small-molecule therapeutic candidate, called gene-targeted chimera, that are designed to be disease-modifying and target the underlying cause of inherited nucleotide repeat expansion diseases.
